properties.description: Description Custom Manual - MCSB Baseline item DP-5 for Azure Migrate
properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item DP-5 for Azure Migrate

features.featureName: Data at Rest Encryption Using CMK
features.featureDescription: Data at-rest encryption using customer-managed keys is supported for customer content stored by the service.
features.featureGuidance:
Enable and implement data at rest encryption for your replicated data using customer-managed keys. 

To replicate VMs with CMK, you'll need to create a disk encryption set under the target Resource Group. A disk encryption set object maps Managed Disks to a Key Vault that contains the CMK to use for SSE.
features.customerActionsDescription: Use customer-managed key option in data at rest encryption when required
